Name: Add-AppPackage
Synopsis: Adds a signed app package to a user account.

Name: Add-AppPackageVolume
Synopsis: Adds an appx volume to the Package Manager.

Name: Dismount-AppPackageVolume
Synopsis: Dismounts an appx volume.

Name: Get-AppPackage
Synopsis: Gets a list of the app packages that are installed in a user profile.

Name: Get-AppPackageLastError
Synopsis: Get the last error reported in the app package installation logs.

Name: Get-AppPackageLog
Synopsis: Gets an app package installation log.

Name: Get-AppPackageManifest
Synopsis: Gets the manifest of an app package.

Name: Get-AppPackageVolume
Synopsis: Gets appx volumes for the computer.

Name: Mount-AppPackageVolume
Synopsis: Mounts an appx volume.

Name: Move-AppPackage
Synopsis: Moves a package from its current location to another appx volume.

Name: Remove-AppPackage
Synopsis: Removes an app package from a user account.

Name: Remove-AppPackageVolume
Synopsis: Removes an appx volume.

Name: Set-AppPackageDefaultVolume
Synopsis: Specifies a default appx volume.
